general.title: Thank You!
general.description: We've received your request. Our team will be in touch shortly to help you get started with Picsellia.

demo.title: Demo Scheduled!
demo.description: Thank you for booking a demo. You'll receive a calendar invite shortly with all the details.

pricing.title: Request Received!
pricing.description: Thank you for your interest. Our team will prepare a custom quote and reach out within 24 hours.

trial.title: Trial Activated!
trial.description: Your 14-day free trial is now active. Check your email for login instructions and get started building!
